experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: • Conceptualised AI-first healthcare products for radiology imaging of heart, lung and bone risk• Built the Product strategy and 2-year roadmap • Developed PRD for qCT• Presented competitive research and strategic analysis of products in global markets• Worked on data acquisition of 100k scans for algorithm training• Stakeholder meetings with design, research, engineering, regulatory, clinical and operations team for existing products• Identified a TAM of > $200 M as use cases for qCT• Use-cases being CAC score, ILD, COPD, and Osteoporosis in global health• Developed strategy which brought 3X revenue
experience.description_html: • Conceptualised AI-first healthcare products for radiology imaging of heart, lung and bone risk• Built the Product strategy and 2-year roadmap • Developed PRD for qCT• Presented competitive research and strategic analysis of products in global markets• Worked on data acquisition of 100k scans for algorithm training• Stakeholder meetings with design, research, engineering, regulatory, clinical and operations team for existing products• Identified a TAM of > $200 M as use cases for qCT• Use-cases being CAC score, ILD, COPD, and Osteoporosis in global health• Developed strategy which brought 3X revenue

experience.title: Associate Program Manager
experience.description: • Successfully presented execution plans, strategies and estimates for CAP Referral program, which sought to get 950+ new creators• Owned and drove multiple initiatives under Creator Academy Program, managed a cohort of 90+ creators and achieved desired KPI• Analysed data points, managed the onboarding MIS dashboard, and collaborated with pan India regional managers to track progress• Supported in conducting feedback calls and communications, also helped fast-track the handover process through effective solutions

projects: [{"title":"Equity Research | QUOLLAB | Experience Project, Supervised by: Krushi Bandi ex –EY","start_date":"May 2021","end_date":"Jun 2021","description":"• Forecasted income statement and balance sheet of a virtual Cement Company using Management Call and Financial Model• Generated insights through PESTLE, Porter’s 5 Force and SWOT analysis to perform Macro and Micro factor analysis• Explored Discounted Cash Flow and Relative valuation method; calculated Enterprise & Intrinsic value for virtual company"},{"title":"Mathematical Finance and Stochastic Process | STAMATICS","start_date":"Apr 2021","end_date":"Jun 2021","description":"• Studied the Modern Portfolio Theory and performed Efficient Frontier Analysis using Python (NumPy, pandas, Matplotlib)• Explored various underlying stochastic methods and theories used in Derivative Pricing like Wiener Process, Ito’s Lemma• Understood the derivation of the famed Black–Scholes–Merton differential equation and its Pricing formulas"},{"title":"Socio-Economic Impact of Covid-19 | Research Project","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"Data:• Collected Panel data of weather variables affecting Air Quality of 8 major Indian cities, Time-Series data of Lockdown Stringency(India) and used Google mobility data of over 14 Months.Analysis:• Applied Fixed and Random effects model followed by Hausman test to analyse the impact of Covid-19 on Air Quality.• Employed Ordinary Least Square (OLS) for studying the impact of Covid-19 on Indian economy using Google Community Mobility data as a proxy for measuring Economic activities with R2 value upto 93.5%.• Devised Linear and Non-linear mathematical model for weather variable variation with Air Quality during Covid- 19.Conclusion:• Tested the hypothesis and provided the consolidated rationale behind the happenings using data-driven inferences.• Concluded that Covid-19 had a Positive Impact on Air Quality of Indian cities and a Negative Impact on the Economy."}]
